title: What you need to know about Foot-and-Mouth Disease.

tasks.task: Understand foot and mouth disease in livestock.
subtasks: Identify affected animals (cows, sheep, goats, pigs).
Recognize signs of FMD (fever, difficulty eating, blisters, lesions).
Isolate infected animals and limit farm movements.
Contact veterinarian for diagnosis and samples.
Follow containment measures and authorities' guidance.
Avoid direct contact with infected animals.
Clean and disinfect equipment, clothing, and vehicles.
Follow biosecurity protocols on farm visits.
